nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze

Class ReplayBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.Board
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.ReplayBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ReplayBoard
extends Board
    Board extension that takes a queue of moves to perform on the actors within the level in order to replay a previous game.
    Author:
    Fynn -Creator
    See Also:
